resume_text:
NAME: David Garcia
EMAIL: david.garcia@email.com
PHONE: (555) 789-0123

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with 8+ years in automating and streamlining software development processes. Expertise in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Git, Python

EXPERIENCE:
CloudOps Ltd. - DevOps Engineer (2017 - Present)
- Automated software deployment using Docker and Kubernetes.
- Managed AWS infrastructure using Terraform.

Systems Integration - Systems Administrator (2015 - 2017)
- Maintained and monitored Linux servers.
- Implemented automation tools using Python.

EDUCATION:
University of Texas - Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (2015)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Certified Kubernetes Administrator
